subtle.description: Provides visual rest and contrast against the default background.

emphasis.description: Provides the highest contrast against the default background, such as in tooltips.

inset.description: Can be used instead of the default background to create a focal point, such as in conversations or activity feeds.

default.description: Primary color for text and icons in any given interface. It should be used for body content, titles and labels.

muted.description: Use for content that is secondary or that provides additional context but is not critical to understanding the flow of an interface.

subtle.description: Use for placeholder text, icons or decorative foregrounds.

emphasis.description: Emphasis is the text color designed to combine with -emphasis backgrounds for optimal contrast.

default.description: Accent or primary color is the global default brand colors.

bg.description: Accent or primary color is the global default brand colors.

active.description: Accent or primary color is the global default brand colors.
